Ontario's experience with disaster assistance mirrors insurance industry, which has seen large increase in payouts for disaster events
From 2010/15 43 disasters through prov disaster relief program cost $44,356,488 for public/private damage
From 2005/10 the 17 declared disasters through prov disaster relief program cost $8,222,040 for public/private damage
While costs varied significantly from year to year, costs rose five-fold over the two 5-year periods
Number of declared disasters rose substantially over two 5-year periods, from 17 during the 2005/10 period to 43 during 2010/15 period
Here is some interesting info about the effects of climate change and the occurrence of declared natural disasters in Ontario
